features: Time yourself every time you conduct a flashcard session; Track your performance based on time; Categorize and sub categorize your knowledge; Follow your progress in regard of memorization; Use the spaced repetition technique to absorb knowledge more effectively; Track in detail your mastery of knowledge; High School and undergraduate students that have to memorize information for multiple tests; Professionals that have to handle highly complex amounts of information and have to retain information and data; Job or Graduate applicants that need to perfect mastery of knowledge by practicing constantly with specific types of questions; High demand test takers for exams such as GMAT or GRE
